Membership Waivers and Dues

Membership Dues

Every member of Pale Kai pays yearly dues in the amount of $350. This money goes towards the cost of maintaining our outriggers and club site, race fees, and insurance. Once paid, you will be considered a current 2017 Pale Kai member, with paddeling opportunites through out the year.

Required Waivers and Literature

The following waivers and are required to join Pale Kai. Please review supporting documentation as well.

  • SCORA 2017 Liability Waiver
  • PKO Safety Policy
  • PKO ByLaws
  • PKO Membership and Dues Policy
  • Paddling Manual
